author: Odeinoichus
title: Llama, Llama, Llama.
review:
Set #71027 Llama Costume Girl: It's time for another in a long line of fun and funny animal costumed characters. The Llama costume Girl has a standard looking torso design with limited printing for a furry belly and a zipper on the back to 'take off' the costume when she changes outfits. Her feet are printed on the toes for the hooves and she brings a fancy carrot to nibble on.

The headpiece is completely brand new with excellent sculpting to represent the creature form, her facial print includes open-toothed smile with wide grin and closed-mouth smile showing off the red lipstick she's wearing.

Ultimately this is an excellent addition to the numerous costume clade Minifigures in mascot designs. She has a suitable look to her and the head piece is great, overall I'd recommend getting one or two. Recommended.
